396 
397 // Return a reference to the collision dispatch configuration
398 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE CollisionDispatch& CollisionDetectionSystem::getCollisionDispatch() {
399  return mCollisionDispatch;
400 }
401 
402 // Add a body to the collision detection
403 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE void CollisionDetectionSystem::addCollider(Collider* collider, const AABB& aabb) {
404 
405  // Add the body to the broad-phase
406  mBroadPhaseSystem.addCollider(collider, aabb);
407 
408  int broadPhaseId = mCollidersComponents.getBroadPhaseId(collider->getEntity());
409 
410  assert(!mMapBroadPhaseIdToColliderEntity.containsKey(broadPhaseId));
411 
412  // Add the mapping between the collider broad-phase id and its entity
413  mMapBroadPhaseIdToColliderEntity.add(Pair<int, Entity>(broadPhaseId, collider->getEntity()));
414 }
415 
416 // Remove a pair of bodies that cannot collide with each other
417 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE void CollisionDetectionSystem::removeNoCollisionPair(Entity body1Entity, Entity body2Entity) {
418  mNoCollisionPairs.remove(OverlappingPairs::computeBodiesIndexPair(body1Entity, body2Entity));
419 }
420 
421 // Ask for a collision shape to be tested again during broad-phase.
424 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE void CollisionDetectionSystem::askForBroadPhaseCollisionCheck(Collider* collider) {
425 
426  if (collider->getBroadPhaseId() != -1) {
427  mBroadPhaseSystem.addMovedCollider(collider->getBroadPhaseId(), collider);
428  }
429 }
430 
431 // Return a pointer to the world
432 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE PhysicsWorld* CollisionDetectionSystem::getWorld() {
433  return mWorld;
434 }
435 
436 // Return a reference to the memory manager
437 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE MemoryManager& CollisionDetectionSystem::getMemoryManager() const {
438  return mMemoryManager;
439 }
440 
441 // Update a collider (that has moved for instance)
442 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE void CollisionDetectionSystem::updateCollider(Entity colliderEntity) {
443 
444  // Update the collider component
445  mBroadPhaseSystem.updateCollider(colliderEntity);
446 }
447 
448 // Update all the enabled colliders
449 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE void CollisionDetectionSystem::updateColliders() {
450  mBroadPhaseSystem.updateColliders();
451 }
452 
453 #ifdef IS_RP3D_PROFILING_ENABLED
454 
455 // Set the profiler
456 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE void CollisionDetectionSystem::setProfiler(Profiler* profiler) {
457  mProfiler = profiler;
458  mBroadPhaseSystem.setProfiler(profiler);
459  mCollisionDispatch.setProfiler(profiler);
460  mOverlappingPairs.setProfiler(profiler);
461 }
462 
463 #endif
464 
465 }
466 
467 #endif
